entry.title: $2400 // W/D**Pre War*//Sun Drenched/Very Unique*Outdoor Space
entry.content:
Presenting a very unique, full sized 1 bedroom with Washer/Dryer in the apt.
Full sized apartment with direct southern view.
Beautiful pre war details throughout.
High ceilings, exposed brick, original wood plank style floors from 1910 with updated oak floors.
Chef's kitchen with dishwasher, garbage compactor, wine rack, microwave.
Custom built in home office, dry bar and storage.
Excellent closet space. Queen sized bedroom, excellent closet space and additional storage.
Beautiful pre war building, very pet friendly.
Access to entire roof all year. Laundry next door.
3 blocks to Q, 6 trains, Downtown Express Buss on the corner
